ultimate.name: One With the Mists
ultimate.description: Immediately regain all Metal. For the next _duration turns, whenever you use Metal, immediately regain all Metal.

abilities.name: Walk
abilities.description: Move up to _moveSpeed tiles. Cannot pass through enemies or obstacles.

abilities.name: Glass Daggers
abilities.description: Deal _damageCalc damage to an adjacent target. Finishing

abilities.name: Pewter
abilities.description: Until the start of your next turn, your armor is increased by _valueCalc and your attacks deal an additional _valueCalc damage.

abilities.name: Duralumin
abilities.description: The next time you use Pewter or Steel Push, consume all Metal and increase the effects of the ability based on how much Metal was consumed.
